titleStmt.title: The second booke of Primaleon of Greece.And Prince Edward of England Continuing the course of their rare fortunes, knightly aduentures, successe in loue, and admirable escape from verie perillous enchauntments: as the like delightfull historie hath sildome been heard of. Translated out of French by A.M. one of the messengers of her Maiesties chamber.
Primaleon (Romance). English. Selections.
titleStmt.author: Munday, Anthony, 1553-1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Iohn Danter for Cuthbert Burby, and are to be sold at his shop nere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Anthony Munday, of "Histoire de Primaleón de Grèce", a French translation of the anonymous Spanish romance "Primaleon".
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1475-1640 reel 2015 has leaves A1-4 2L2-4 2M1-4 and 2N1 only.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop nere the Royall Exchange
